txt.en: 'What is this? Standing around here, afraid to leave these walls? If you can't follow the War-tyrant's orders, then you follow mine: get out! Reinforce the line at the Grimwood Lumber-camp, or I'll have you dragged there.'
'Ah, the fading races have revealed themselves. The War-tyrant will no doubt organize his next attacks.'
The battle lines have been failing as pressure from the Free Peoples increases throughout the Ettenmoors.
The Grimwood Lumber-camp lies to the south of Gramsfoot.\n\nSoldier Búzog ordered you to reinforce the Grimwood Lumber-camp.
Soldier Búzog is at Gramsfoot.\n\nYou should report to Soldier Búzog.
